title: Ticket #5615: [EC2] Allow user to specify their own security group
description: condor_annex should permit the user to specify their own security group (or leave one available named as usual to be the default, as usual). This irritated Martin Kandes.
remarks:
2016-Aug-25 11:23:31 by tlmiller:
Abandoning, as it only applies to the prototype. (The daemon already supports this.)
creator: tlmiller
